messages.message: Hi team, I just merged this PR (https://github.com/instabase/instabase/pull/71238) to set `ENABLE_PERMS_V2` to true on master. I also updated Cypress config to have `enable_perms_v2: true` for Crafting-cyp env. I don't want to trigger a redeployment to crafting-cyp to pick up the changes, so I manually patched the env. If you have any Cypress tests failing, please rebase master to pick up this change. Thanks!
